name: Cosmos Quest III
description: After spending an 2 weeks holiday leave relaxing at the Jaro Motor Inn, Sergeant Henry Getz was on his way back to Radion Space Station (RSS). He has no idea that RSS has been attacked by the evil Ayatolians, or that the entire crew has been captured. Luckily, one of the crew (Nia) has managed to send him a message, informing him of what has happened., as well as telling him that the crew is being taken to a planet called Isagor. Devastated at this drastic turn of events, Sergeant Getz changes course, and heads for Isagor, determined to rescue his friends. But of course, even after reaching Isagor, things are not so straight forward, and Getz faces many perils as he searches for his friends. He has to rely on his wits and his quick thinking if he is to survive. After all, the fate of the Radion Space Station crew rests in his hands...
